title.narrative: Support to AWEN, preparation of intervention
Support to AWEN, preparation of intervention

description.narrative: The support is provided to ensure that AWEN implements key recommendations of the Efficiency Audit Report (2015-03-11). This preparation phase will be followed by project support to AWEN. Most of the preparatory work will be carried out by AWEN staff, board members and organisations that are members of the network. For some activities, AWEN will use external support from national experts. The intervention duration is six months and it will focus primarly on addressing the weaknesses identified by the Efficiency audit. In additions small scale lobbying and advocacy related activities of AWEN and members are included.

The support is provided to ensure that AWEN implements key recommendations of the Efficiency Audit Report (2015-03-11). This preparation phase will be followed by project support to AWEN. Most of the preparatory work will be carried out by AWEN staff, board members and organisations that are members of the network. For some activities, AWEN will use external support from national experts. The intervention duration is six months and it will focus primarly on addressing the weaknesses identified by the Efficiency audit. In additions small scale lobbying and advocacy related activities of AWEN and members are included.
Stödet ges för att säkerställa att AWEN genomför de viktigaste rekommendationerna i effektivitetsrevisionen (2015-03-11). Denna förberedelsefas kommer att följas av ett projektstöd till AWEN. Merparten av det förberedande arbetet kommer att utföras av AWENs personal, styrelseledamöter och organisationer som är medlemmar i nätverket. För vissa aktiviteter, kommer AWEN använda externt stöd från nationella experter. Insatsperioden är sex månader och kommer att fokusera primärt på att ta itu med brister som effektivitetsrevisionen identifierade. I tillägg ingår några mindre aktiviteter kring lobbying och opinionsbildning där AWEN och dess medlemmar ingår.
